data.title: Michael & Susan Dell Foundation
data.meta_description: We're dedicated to transforming the lives of children living in urban poverty through improved education, health, and family economic stability.
data.text:
Education

Our education programs create pathways out of poverty for families. Access to high-quality schools, access to the right classroom tools and technology, and support to close the graduation gapâ€”it all makes a difference.

Family economic stability

From skill development to meaningful employment to financial services, we connect people with resources that help them build a better future for their families.

Our 7 Social Impact Goals Guide Us

Each year, we will create access to high-quality education for over 7 million aspiring students globally to learn at or above grade level.

See Our Goals

Our 7 Social Impact Goals Guide Us

Each year, we will enable over 500,000 classrooms globally with high-quality tools, technology, and resources to better serve students.

See Our Goals

Our 7 Social Impact Goals Guide Us

Each year, we will help over 350,000 aspiring students globally to earn university degrees.

See Our Goals

Our 7 Social Impact Goals Guide Us

Each year, we will create access to employment opportunities for over 1 million aspiring young adults globally to build meaningful careers.

See Our Goals

Our 7 Social Impact Goals Guide Us

Each year, we will create access to responsible financial services globally for over 3 million families and micro entrepreneurs to achieve economic stability.

See Our Goals

Our 7 Social Impact Goals Guide Us

Each year, we will create access to world-class and innovative care for over 1 million families in the US to live healthier lives.

See Our Goals
